name: Northern Presbytery
description: The Northern Presbytery covers the northern region and oversees several churches and pastors. It focuses on community engagement and spiritual growth.

name: Central Presbytery
description: The Central Presbytery is responsible for the central region. It supports the spiritual and administrative needs of its churches and members.

name: Southern Presbytery
description: The Southern Presbytery serves the southern region. It focuses on pastoral care and community development initiatives.
